settings_excluded_domains_description.message:
2FAS Pass nie będzie proponować dodawania 
nowych elementów dla następujących domen.
settings_excluded_domains_description.description: Explains that excluded domains won't prompt for adding new logins

settings_excluded_domains_empty.description: Message displayed when no domains are excluded

settings_excluded_domains_remove.message: Usuń wybraną domenę z listy ignorowanych.
settings_excluded_domains_remove.description: Button label to remove a domain from the excluded list

settings_excluded_domains_remove_toast.description: Message displayed when a domain is successfully removed from the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_required.description: Validation message when trying to add an empty domain

settings_excluded_domains_add_invalid.description: Validation message when the provided domain is invalid

settings_excluded_domains_add_already_ig.description: Validation message when trying to add a domain that is already in the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_success.message: Pomyślnie dodano domenę do listy ignorowanych
settings_excluded_domains_add_success.description: Message displayed when a domain is successfully added to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_domain_tex.description: Label for the input field to add a new domain to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_another_do.description: Label for the button to add another domain to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_input_plac.description: Placeholder text for the input field to add a new domain to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_submit_tit.description: Title for the button to submit a new domain to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_add_cancel_tit.description: Title for the button to cancel ignoring a new domain to the ignored list

settings_excluded_domains_remove_dialog_.message: Czy na pewno chcesz usunąć DOMAIN z listy ignorowanych domen?
settings_excluded_domains_remove_dialog_.description: Confirmation message when removing a domain from the ignored list
